topic.title: FOREACH macro
topic.p: FOREACH(TYPE, VAR, COLLECTION) is replaced by for (auto VAR : COLLECTION).

topic.title: FOREACH_INDEXER macro
topic.p: FOREACH(TYPE, VAR, INDEX, COLLECTION) is replaced by for (auto [VAR, INDEX] : indexed(COLLECTION)).

topic.title: NotCopyable class
topic.p: Please use =delete; on constructors, copy constructors, move constructors, copy assignment operator and move assignment operator accordingly.

topic.title: Ptr<T> and ComPtr<T> class
topic.p: Constructors taking an T* argument become explicit.

topic.title: String classes
topic.p:
Non-trivial constructors are removed replaced by following static functions:
TakeOver
FromChar
CopyFrom
Unmanaged
UnsafeCastFrom

topic.title: MoveValue<T> and ForwardValue<T> function
topic.p: Please use std::move and std::forward instead.

topic.title: MakePtr<T> function
topic.p: MakePtr<T>(...) is replaced by Ptr(new T(...)).
